Html:
... and how can I remove entries from it

Thanks

You can remove an expression library entry by selecting it and pressing the Delete key on the keyboard.  I need to add a button for that as well.  The expression library is stored along with other user settings in the following file:

C:\Users\<USERNAME>\AppData\Local\XmlExplorer\XmlExplorer.exe_Url_h5ycpqmhiescdbwgec3ysskpufta4kpm\4.0.2.0\user.config

Make sure you replace <USERNAME> with your Windows username, and the path may vary based on the version you're running.  For more info on settings and the path used, see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms379611%28v=vs.80%29.aspx#vbmysettings_topic3
